actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Committee on the Judiciary to refer H.R. 3316 to the court of claims for further proceedings in accordance with applicable law.

summary.text: Refers to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims a bill for the relief of a named individual. Directs the Commissioner to report to the House of Representatives on the nature of the claim against the United States and the amount, if any, due such individual from the United States.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Committee on the Judiciary to refer H.R. 3316 to the court of claims for further proceedings in accordance with applicable law.
